item.title: Problem changing the the starting gear
item.dc:creator: @wasupman27 wasupman27
item.description:
@wasupman27 wrote:

Ok i have this problem where I want to change the starting gear of my server. But when i change the gear it doesn’t work. Do I compile it? Well i did compile it and it gives me errors from the client.java file. Also btw how would I change the starting stats aswell?

Heres the code if you need more of the code let me know.

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=1042; playerEquipment[playerCape]=6570; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=4757; playerEquipment[playerShield]=1187; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4087; playerEquipment[playerHands]=6922; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=6920; playerEquipment[playerRing]=6735; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

Read full topic
